column1: Has she performed oral sex on him?
...Nice.
Nisssse.
Yeah, boys going to Milan with a beautiful older woman. Quick! Call the FBI!
Whoa, no, no!
It's over.
Jesus Christ, we need backup out here!
The soft room?
Most of the town, sir. It's a graveyard smash.
Sorry. I can't see a thing in here.
Hey hay, I can't see! Where do I go?
Sir, we've found something, at the Hummer sales lot outside of town.
All right, that's enough. Come on out and there won't be any trouble.  Give it up, Stotch. You've nowhere to run.
Detective Harris! Sir! We've got a problem!
Freeze, asshole!
Don't push me, man!
Gaahhh!
Hand over the boy, now!
I mean it, lady, you've got about-!  Whoops.
Yeah, let's go! Come on, bring it!
Use the taser! Use the taser!
He put up a hell of a fight, but we got him!
Don't do it son! You have too much to live for!
JEESUS CHIRST!
